price: N’iyo (wowe Muhamadi) wakoresha umuhate kugira ngo bayoboke, mu by’ukuri Allah ntayobora uyobya abandi. Kandi ntibazagira ababatabara.
arabic: إِن تَحۡرِصۡ عَلَىٰ هُدَىٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَن يُضِلُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: in taḥriṣ ʿalā hudāhum fa-inna al-laha lā yahdī man yuḍillu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
